ComicInfo.Summary:
Inspired by Tales From the Crypt, Twilight Zone, and Creep Show, Zenescope goes back to its roots of horror as the publisher known for re-inventing classics delves into an entirely new bag of tricks.
When a college undergrad decides to stay in and study, she will find that another seemingly inconsequential decision she makes will have a lasting effect on her.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Vinicius Andrade | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric J & Luis Guerrero | 2 | C | Cover C | Jorge Meguro | 3 | RE | Montreal Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Jose Luis & Ula Mos | | Note: The digital edition (9/10/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
